long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RedmineMe is a notifications extension for Redmine. RedmineMe checks out changes from issues 1 time per 10 minutes and, if they are, saves them and shows in the feed. 3 separated tabs: assigned to me, watching, created by me. Multiple options: customizing time to keep notifications, colour of priorities, query IDs for direct links to the list of assigned or created issues, etc.
